actions.text: Committee on Agriculture ordered to be reported an original measure.
Committee on Agriculture. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Helms. Without written report.
Referred to the Committee on Budget.
Committee on Budget. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Budget. Reported to Senate by Senator Domenici without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 300.
Motion to proceed to consideration of measure agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 66-26. Record Vote No: 230.
Motion to recommit to Senate Committee on Agriculture tabled in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-32. Record Vote No: 232.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Yea-Nay Vote. 64-31. Record Vote No: 233.

official_title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 2733.

summary.text: Waives certain requirements of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 2733 (rubber research and development program).

titles.title: An original resolution waiving section 402 (a) of the Congressional Budget Act of 1974 with respect to the consideration of H.R. 2733.
